ComicInfo.Summary:
The secret’s out – MAD #523 is on sale now! It’s got our spoofs ofHomelandand the Williams-Sonoma catalog, as well as our moronic mockery of50 Shades of Greyand global warming. As if that wasn’t revealing enough, there’s also Planet Tad, the MAD Fold-In, Spy vs. Spy, the MAD Strip Club and much, much more! If you spy a copy, buy it immediately!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-12-11 23:28:56. [Issue ID 423663]
